column4: any one know how to get the splash screen to work on boot up... Im blank pun intended
IF Zune users use the Zune App, and Ipod users use Itunes, what does linux have as an app
APo: so if I do a search in synaptic ill find mv
oh, well what would linux users use to manage their media library
all in one place (like Zune, and Itunes)
I would want something to manage all media (pics, music, movies)
Dunno, there's a bunch of software that can talk to iPods. Rhythmbox, I think.
Or gpixpod, that seems to be able to handle your photos.
Just do a search for ipod in synaptic and choose what you want.
